27 May 2022

A short list of sites where you can see what’s happening in orbit:

  • SolarHam’s Space Weather
  • SpaceWeather.com has news and information about meteor showers, solar flares, auroras, and near-Earth asteroids.
  • ESRI’s Satellite Map Shows 19K+ Satellites Orbiting Earth.
  • The Radar Page: Security Wizardry Cyber Threat Intelligence.
